channel.title: Anyone want to make a new 317 Client?
channel.description: I got one renamed by pd. Looking to make a ultra sleek, many client, client.

item.title: Anyone want to make a new 317 Client?
item.dc:creator: @philodespotos philodespotos
item.description:
@philodespotos wrote:

I have no idea what ruler is saying now. What he asked for from me was 377, renamed by factor. That is what I provided.

If he wanted 317, factor does not even remotely work on it. factor’s ruleset is written around a change that occured somewhere ~347 (it’s been a while). 317 is (unsurprisingly) very different from the later clients. Hacking up the rules should not at all be difficult, as quite a few would have no corresponding code in 317 and could simply be eliminated, but I’m certainly not going to be the one to do it.

If someone needs a copy of factor, I can provide it. I tend to only come to these forums by fluke or extreme boredom, so IRC is probably the easier place to find me. irc.eggsampler.com, occasionally irc.efak.net.

Edit: Scratch that. A thread or two below this already contains a link for factor, and 317.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone want to make a new 317 Client?

item.title: Anyone want to make a new 317 Client?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The last before the switch to the new client was 377, not 317. Or perhaps you meant the last version of factor succesfully renamed 317? But I would like to have the 317 renamed by factor so I don’t have to do the work myself. If someone could hook me up with that it would be great.

Read full topic
